page.title: 01Repton and surroundings
page.content: This block consists of most of the large village of {REPTON} and the smaller village of {NEWTON SOLNEY}.The historic village of REPTON is situated on the edge of the flood plain of the River {TRENT}. Repton is best known for its ancient{ {PUBLIC SCHOOL}(founded in the 14th. Century) and for the village church of {ST. WYSTANS }with its rare{ SAXON {CRYPT. The surrounding countryside is rural but is criss-crossed by electric pylons leading from the chain of { {POWER STATIONS}which are dotted along the River Trent.
